abstract: Police in Kalamazoo, Mich, are hunting for suspect they say killed six people in series of random shootings throughout city.

headline.print_headline: Hunt On for Gunman Who Killed at Least 6 in Michigan
headline.main: At Least 6 Are Killed in Random Shootings in Kalamazoo

snippet: The police said they had taken a suspect into custody after the shootings in the Kalamazoo, Mich., area.
lead_paragraph: The police said they had taken a suspect into custody after the shootings in the Kalamazoo, Mich., area.
